about_the_game:
Try and land the perfect delivery!
Join a tiny team of robots as they make their deliveries. Try your best to work together and keep the delivery steady, finding the right balance as you navigate through the obstacles and challenges ahead to reach your goal. Hopefully, with as much of the delivery still in tact as possible.


Plays solo or local Co-op.
Try your hand at controlling both characters at the same time when playing solo, or bring a friend along for a co-op game and each take control of one of the characters.


Endless Mode.
How high can you fly? Take on the Golden Cog challenge and put your flying skills to the test. Try to navigate your way through an endless level that generates itself randomly with obstacles of all shapes and sizes and join the leaderboard.

Custom Characters.
Try out a shiny new coat of paint, a different hat perhaps, or maybe even a moustache?
You can customize each of the characters however you like. You can also pay a visit to the local Cog Shop, where you can spend your hard earned cogs on new items after each successful delivery. Also, keep an eye out for mystery boxes around levels which could hold secret items?


Meet a whole host of characters and unlock new zones.
As you progress, new zones will unlock which you can explore and take on the challenges that lie ahead. You might even make a new friend or 2 along the way.

short_description: Play solo or local co-op in this physics based, chaotic delivery game. Join a tiny team of robots as they try and work together to make their deliveries. Can you help keep the cargo steady enough to reach the goal? Can you land the perfect delivery?
